channel.title: -Need Port forwarding help with unusual Verizon router-
channel.description: I have searched everywhere for a guide on how to port forward with my router but I have only seen a few other people that even have the model..and none of them were using it for RSPS. I'd really like some help over teamviewer or something please. Thanks in advance to anyone willing to help. This is my PF settings page... http://screensnapr.com/v/zkvN2K.png

item.title: -Need Port forwarding help with unusual Verizon router-
item.dc:creator: @Thanks Thanks
item.description:
@Thanks wrote:

Well since I just googled it…I recommend to follow a guide for minecraft…it should be exactly the same as you would for rsps.

I would help with teamviewer or something like that but I can’t atm…if you still have problems tomorrow pm me and I will try =/

EDIT: Make sure the port is 43594…or whatever you want it to be. The minecraft one is different.

Read full topic
item.source: -Need Port forwarding help with unusual Verizon router-

item.title: -Need Port forwarding help with unusual Verizon router-

item.description:
@Thanks wrote:

I am pretty sure it is the same thing…try looking on portforward.com if you already haven’t =/
